full_text: Screened by NARA, 9/21/2023 Budget Bureau No. 44-R1301.1. SUPPLEMENTAL STATEMENT FOR LIVE-AT-WORK JOB OFFERS 2761 (Form ES-575B, Supplement 1) INSTRUCTIONS.-An employer submitting an application for Alien Employment Certi- fication, Form ES-575B, for a job for which an alien is required to live at his place of employment, must also furnish the information indicated below. This Supplemental Statement is prepared in an original and one copy and submitted with Form ES-575B. Betty Pei-ing Mao 720 S. San Rafael Ave, Pasadena, Calif. 91105 (Name of Alien) (Address Where Alien Will Reside) 3 None 1. Number of persons residing at place of employment: Adults Children 2. If alien is to live in household of employer, what is gross family income of all adult mem- bers domiciled at place of employment? $ 100,000. + Number of adults in an earning capacity One 3. How many bedrooms and bathrooms at place of employment? Bedrooms 4 Bathrooms 4 plus two maids rooms and one bath 4. List all deductions to be withheld from alien's salary Social security taxes TELLIFI 5. Will alien be furnished a private room? Yes X No 6. Are there any persons for whom the alien will be required to give special care or atten- tion? If so, please explain None 7. Explain what provision is made for time off for-alien Every Thursday and every other Sunday, plus additional on- request. Also free for one hour in morning and 31/2 hours in afternoon on working days. 8. If opening is to be filled by an alien currently employed by you, state the duties, salary, and the date employment began Mrs. Mao began work for us on June 17, 1968. Cook and maid (See attached letter of explanation) $330 per month for Tew44 350 hour week 9. If you intend to fill the opening with an alien who is related to you by blood or marriage, indicate the relationship Not related 10. Attach a copy of written contract, letter of agreement, or other contractural document between the employer and the alien covering specific terms and conditions of employment. DATE April 21, 1969 SIGNATURE U.S. GOVERNMENT PRINTING OFFICE 1966-O-242-217 Employer OF Representative For sale by the Superintendent of Documents, U.S. Government Printing Office, Washington, D.C. 20402 - Price $1.00 per pad
